rulesStrings.li: good_opinion->Mmm... it's nothing — sorry to have bothered you.

good_opinion(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->I agree, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]! Quite the piece of art! I like it too!
no_passion(INITIATOR_intellectual_level<5)->Mmm... Can't understand its artistic beauty — but yes, it looks nice!
no_passion(INITIATOR_intellectual_level>=5)->I'm not into arts, but — yes, I may say it is a nice item.
birch->Birches have such slender and elegant trunks!
birch->Moreover, birches are a blessing for the land — they improve its fertility.
oak->Majestic and sturdy — a truly masterwork of Nature!
oak->Oaks can live more than a thousand years — an inspiring symbol of endurance!
pine->So charming — and its bark has such a nice perfume!
poplar->So beautiful! Moreover, poplars grow so quick — a perfect wood source!
